channel.title: AP News - US News
channel.description: Top US News stories from AP News

item.title: On the heels of a dry winter, firefighters around the US brace for wildfire risks
item.description: From the southwestern U.S. to Minnesota, Iowa and even parts of New Jersey, it was a dismal winter. Many communities marked record dryness between December and the end of February.

item.title: Thousands of workers at nation’s health agencies brace for mass layoffs
‘JFK’ director Oliver Stone to testify to Congress about the newly released assassination files
